engine
Class Options

java.lang.Object
  engine.Options
public class Options
extends java.lang.Object

This class works in coordination with Gui_Options to set options, save options to file, and read options from file. The options are stored as an XML file, and are re-written every time the options are saved.

Constructor Summary
Options()
          Creates a new instance of Options and reads current options from file

          Sets current options and creates XML file (only if set options are different from default options.

Constructor Detail

Options

public Options()
Creates a new instance of Options and reads current options from file

Options

public Options(boolean anyKeyAhead,
               sam.systemtools.Key keyAhead,
               sam.systemtools.Key leftKey,
               sam.systemtools.Key rightKey,
               int fontSize,
               java.awt.Color fontColor,
               java.awt.Color backColor)
Sets current options and creates XML file (only if set options are different from default options.

Parameters:
anyKeyAhead - Whether any keyboard button will move the program forward. Default is true.
keyAhead - Which key will move program forward. Default is Space.
leftKey - Which key corresponds to the left option. Default is left arrow.
rightKey - Which key corresponds to the right option. Default is right arrow.
fontSize - Size of font.
fontColor - Color of font.
backColor - Color of background.
